dialogue: Now that I have demolished your argument with my superior logic, what will you do?
Don't do it! Don't you dare!
Okay, I won't use an analogy.
How about an example instead of an analogy?
What if a bear tried to make popcorn in the vacuum of space?
That's an analogy, and it has nothing to do with what we were discussing!
Why can't you admit you're wrong?
